newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Wah Kwong says chairman will resign.
newsitem.headline: Wah Kwong says chairman will resign.

text.p: Wah Kwong Shipping Holdings Ltd said T Y Chao would resign as chairman and a director of the company if there was no improvement in his health.

"The health of T Y Chao has declined in recent months and, if there is no improvement in the near future, it is intended that he will resign as the chairman and a director of the company at the next annual general meeting of the company to be held in or around August of this year," it said in a statement.

The ship owing group said Chao's illness and his resignation would not have any significant effect on the company's prospects or operations because Chao had not been involved in day-to-day management for some years.
Wah Kwong shares were uchanged at HK$9.30 each in mid-morning on Wednesday.
